properties.entry: INSERT /* com.greedy.semi.trainer.dao.ClassDAO#insertThumbnailContent() */ INTO TBL_OPENED_CLASS A ( A.CLASS_NO , A.CLASS_NAME , A.CLASS_KIND , A.CLASS_CATEGORY , A.CLASS_INTRO , A.CLASS_INTRODUCE , A.CREATED_DATE , A.TRAINER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_CLASS_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )

INSERT /* com.greedy.semi.trainer.dao.ClassDAO#insertAttachment() */ INTO TBL_CLASS_ATTACHMENT A ( A.CLASS_ATTACHMENT_NO , A.REF_CLASS_NO , A.ORIGINAL_NAME , A.SAVED_NAME , A.SAVE_PATH , A.FILE_TYPE , A.THUMBNAIL_PATH , A.REF_TRAINER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_CLASS_ATTACHMENT_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )

SELECT /* com.greedy.semi.trainer.dao.ClassDAO#selectThumbnailList() */ A.CLASS_NO , A.TRAINER_NO , A.CLASS_NAME , A.CLASS_KIND , A.CLASS_CATEGORY , A.CLASS_KIND , A.CLASS_INTRO , A.CLASS_INTRODUCE , A.CREATED_DATE , A.CLASS_COUNT , B.CLASS_ATTACHMENT_NO , B.REF_TRAINER_NO , B.ORIGINAL_NAME , B.SAVED_NAME , B.SAVE_PATH , B.THUMBNAIL_PATH FROM TBL_OPENED_CLASS A JOIN TBL_CLASS_ATTACHMENT B ON (A.CLASS_NO = B.REF_CLASS_NO) WHERE A.CLASS_STATUS = 'N' AND B.ATTACHMENT_STATUS = 'Y' AND B.FILE_TYPE = 'CLASSNAME' ORDER BY A.CLASS_NO DESC

UPDATE /* com.greedy.semi.trainer.dao.ClassDAO#incrementClassCount() */ TBL_OPENED_CLASS A SET A.CLASS_COUNT = (SELECT B.CLASS_COUNT FROM TBL_OPENED_CLASS B WHERE B.CLASS_NO = ? ) + 1 WHERE A.CLASS_NO = ?

SELECT /* com.greedy.semi.trainer.dao.ClassDAO#selectOneThumbnailClass() */ A.CLASS_NO , A.TRAINER_NO , A.CLASS_NAME , A.CLASS_KIND , A.CLASS_CATEGORY , A.CLASS_INTRO , A.CLASS_INTRODUCE , A.CREATED_DATE , A.CLASS_COUNT , B.CLASS_ATTACHMENT_NO , B.REF_TRAINER_NO , B.ORIGINAL_NAME , B.SAVED_NAME , B.SAVE_PATH , B.FILE_TYPE , B.THUMBNAIL_PATH FROM TBL_OPENED_CLASS A JOIN TBL_CLASS_ATTACHMENT B ON (A.CLASS_NO = B.REF_CLASS_NO) WHERE A.CLASS_STATUS = 'N' AND B.ATTACHMENT_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.CLASS_NO = ?

UPDATE /* com.greedy.semi.trainer.dao.ClassDAO#updateClass() */ TBL_OPENED_CLASS A SET A.CLASS_NAME = ? , A.CLASS_KIND = ? , A.CLASS_CATEGORY = ? , A.CLASS_INTRO = ? , A.CLASS_INTRODUCE = ? , A.CREATED_DATE = ? WHERE A.CLASS_STATUS = 'N' AND A.TRAINER_NO = ?

UPDATE /* com.greedy.semi.trainer.dao.ClassDAO#incrementTrainerCount() */ TBL_OPENED_CLASS A SET A.CLASS_COUNT = (SELECT B.CLASS_COUNT FROM TBL_OPENED_CLASS B WHERE B.CLASS_NO = ? ) + 1 WHERE A.CLASS_NO = ?

SELECT /* com.greedy.semi.trainer.dao.ClassDAO#selectTrainerInfo() */ A.CLASS_NO , A.TRAINER_NO , A.CLASS_NAME , A.CLASS_KIND , A.CLASS_CATEGORY , A.CLASS_INTRO , A.CLASS_INTRODUCE , A.CREATED_DATE , A.CLASS_COUNT , B.MEMBER_NAME , C.CLASS_ATTACHMENT_NO , C.REF_TRAINER_NO , C.ORIGINAL_NAME , C.SAVED_NAME , C.SAVE_PATH , C.THUMBNAIL_PATH FROM TBL_OPENED_CLASS A JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON (A.TRAINER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) JOIN TBL_CLASS_ATTACHMENT C ON (A.CLASS_NO = C.REF_CLASS_NO) WHERE A.CLASS_NO = ? AND C.ATTACHMENT_STATUS = 'Y' AND C.FILE_TYPE = 'INTRODUCE'

INSERT /* com.greedy.semi.trainer.dao.ClassDAO#reservationMember() */ INTO TBL_TRAINER_PT_PERMIT A ( A.PERMIT_NO , A.TRAINER_NO , A.MEMBER_NO , A.CLASS_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_PERMIT_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? )

SELECT A.PERMIT_NO , A.TRAINER_NO , A.MEMBER_NO , A.APPLY_DATE , A.PERMIT_YN , A.PERMIT_DATE , A.CLASS_NO , B.CLASS_ATTACHMENT_NO , B.REF_CLASS_NO , B.ORIGINAL_NAME , B.SAVED_NAME , B.SAVE_PATH , B.THUMBNAIL_PATH FROM TBL_TRAINER_PT_PERMIT A JOIN TBL_CLASS_ATTACHMENT B ON (A.CLASS_NO = B.REF_CLASS_NO) WHERE A.CLASS_NO = ? AND B.ATTACHMENT_STATUS = 'Y' AND B.FILE_TYPE = 'CLASSNAME' ORDER BY A.PERMIT_NO DESC
INSERT /* com.greedy.semi.trainer.dao.CommentDAO#insertComment() */ INTO TBL_COMMENT A ( A.COMMENT_NO , A.COMMNET_WRITER , A.COMMENT_CONTENT ) VALUES ( SEQ_COMMENT_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? )
UPDATE /* com.greedy.semi.trainer.dao.CommentDAO#updateComment() */ TBL_COMMENT A SET A.COMMNET_WRITER = ? , A.COMMENT_CONTENT = ? WHERE A.COMMENT_NO = ?
DELETE FROM TBL_COMMNET A WHERE A.COMMENT_NO = ?
SELECT A.COMMENT_NO , A.COMMENT_WRITER , A.COMMENT_CONTENT , A.COMMENT_DATE FROM TBL_COMMENT A WHERE A.COMMENT_NO = ?
SELECT A.COMMENT_NO , A.COMMENT_WRITER , A.COMMENT_CONTENT , A.COMMENT_DATE FROM TBL_COMMENT A ORDER BY NO DESC;
